an4.98:4.1: “Mendicants, these four people are found in the world.
an4.98:4.3: ~One who practices to benefit themselves, but not others; ~one who practices to benefit others, but not themselves; ~one who practices to benefit neither themselves nor others; and ~one who practices to benefit both themselves and others.
an4.98:4.4: These are the four people found in the world.”
